Key Match Events: Paul George hyperextended his left knee in the second quarter while guarding the Hawks' Jalen Johnson
Pre-Game Insights: Joel Embiid remains sidelined for the 76ers' preseason due to a season-long management plan after undergoing February knee surgery
Coach Nick Nurse said that 'opening night's still a long ways away... so I'm not really sure where we're at with that' regarding Embiid's readiness for the Oct. 23 season opener
Post-Match Reflections: Paul George said he's 'not too concerned about' his knee injury and will see how it feels Tuesday morning and 'evaluate from there'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Sixers' starting lineup featured a new look with guard Eric Gordon replacing forward Caleb Martin
Tyrese Maxey spearheaded the Sixers' turnaround to turn an eight-point deficit into a lead
Others: Rookie guard Jared McCain finished with 11 points and four rebounds after entering late in the third quarter
The Sixers will finish their preseason slate this week with a home game against the Brooklyn Nets and a road date at the Orlando Magic
